text: Olivedale is a suburb of Johannesburg, South Africa. It is located in Region C of the City of Johannesburg Metropolitan Municipality. ==References== Category:Johannesburg Region C Olivedale is a small suburb in the greater Randburg area in Johannesburg, South Africa. It originated as a farm, Olivedale, and the original farmhouse, along with the original farm windmill, still exists today. The windmill now forms part of the area's main nursery school.
title: Olivedale, Gauteng
